Interests

I’m a high school computer science teacher who teaches intro level video game design, honors & AP level comp sci courses, and lastly intro and advanced web design. HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, Python, Bootstrap, Git, GitHub, C++, C#, and React Native are covered in my courses but opportunites to explore other topics in comp sci is a choice I give my students.

Just like I enjoy helping students, I enjoy helping small business accomplish their digital goals. As a freelancer I can truly help and provide the best solutions for my clients. It is a hobby that I absoluetly love.

I’m definitely happiest when solving a problem, exploring a new concept, and connecting students to the possibilities of computer science. Over the course of my teaching career I have had the chance to bring my skills of design, programming and passion for learning to my job every single day.

When approached by family or friends I find the time to help with building custom websites using the tools I teach my students. I find creating a website both educational and rewarding.

Boredem is something I have never experienced. I am always learning.

Away from school you can find me walking with my wife and do or at my computer coding on a Discord bot. I enjoy playing video games reguarly and occasionally like to stream on Twitch just to show how much better I am at video games than my students.
